title: (x) Light hand drawn sans serif - similar to PF DIN {Naoise Ã“ Conchubhair}
content:
Hello,  
Wondering if there is a similar font out there for this Hand Drawn San Serif. Doesn't have to be hand drawn looking, though that would be awesome, just something that is condensed, thin, and has similar letterforms.

Thanks  
Peter.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100608173057im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ex_5024.gif)
author: markatos

comments.content: FF DIN light condensed and Pill Gothic are similar, not an exact match though.
thanks. Orator is similar as well. Would love someone to make this into an open type that plays off the inconsistencies.

Parachute's cut of DIN comes pretty close, the 'F' being the only major difference. You should check out [PF Din Text Compressed Pro Extra Thin](http://web.archive.org/web/20100608173057/http:/www.fonthaus.com/products/fonts/view.cfm/sku/PE10253.cfm). It has a bit more character than the FontShop version.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100608173057im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DIN_4058.jpg)
